auth.account_locked: Account is locked. Try again in {{minutes}} minutes.
auth.too_many_attempts: Too many failed attempts. Account locked for 30 minutes.

users.cannot_delete_self: You cannot delete your own account
users.cannot_modify_own_role: You cannot modify your own role
users.cannot_deactivate_self: You cannot deactivate your own account
users.last_admin_role: At least one admin user must remain in the system
users.last_admin_active: At least one active admin user must remain in the system
users.cannot_add_inactive: Cannot add inactive user to team
users.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
users.passwords_not_match: New password and confirmation do not match

teams.name_already_exists: Team with this name already exists
teams.force_deleted: Team and all its resources deleted successfully
teams.force_delete_suggestion: Use the ?force=true parameter for forced deletion, which will also delete all related resources.
teams.not_found_or_no_permission: Team not found or no permission
teams.not_found_or_no_access: Team not found or no access permission
teams.not_member: You are not a member of this team
teams.not_member_or_inactive: You are not a member of the specified team or the team is inactive
teams.only_owner_can_delete: Only team owner can delete the team
teams.only_owner_can_grant_admin: Only team owner can grant admin role
teams.only_owner_can_remove_admins: Only team owner can remove admin members
teams.only_owner_can_modify_roles: Only team owner can modify roles
teams.only_owner_cannot_remove_self: The only owner cannot remove themselves from the team. First designate another owner.
teams.only_owner_cannot_modify_own_role: The only owner cannot modify their own role. First designate another owner.
teams.user_already_member: User is already a member of the team
teams.check_user_membership: Check if the user is really a new member or choose another user.
teams.check_user_id: Check the user ID correctness or choose another active user.
teams.permission_add_member: Only team owner or administrators can add new members.
teams.member_add_error: An error occurred while adding member. Please try again.
teams.cannot_delete_has_resources: Cannot delete team - active resources found
teams.has_active_resources: Team has {{total}} active resources. Forced deletion required.
teams.safe_to_delete: Team can be safely deleted, no active resources.
teams.normal_delete_description: Normal deletion - only empty team can be deleted
teams.force_delete_description: Forced deletion - team and all its resources will be deleted
teams.force_delete_warning: This will delete all related sources, targets, routes, events and deliveries!

validation.source_type: Type can be synology, proxmox, proxmox_backup, gitlab, docker_updater, media-webhook, uptime-kuma or generic
validation.target_type: Type can be mattermost, rocketchat or webhook
validation.secret_key_length: Secret key must be between 8-255 characters
validation.source_id_positive_integer: Source ID must be a positive integer
validation.target_id_positive_integer: Target ID must be a positive integer
validation.message_template_max_length: Message template can be maximum 2000 characters
validation.delivery_status: Status can be pending, sent or failed
validation.id_positive_integer: ID must be a positive integer
validation.team_name_min_length: Team name must be at least 2 characters long
validation.team_name_max_length: Team name cannot be longer than 255 characters
validation.invalid_role_all: Invalid role. Choose: member, admin, owner
validation.team_id_missing_from_url: Team identifier is missing from URL
validation.team_id_positive_integer: Team ID must be a positive integer
validation.scope_required: Scope is required and can only be "personal" or "team"
validation.no_team_id_for_personal: team_id cannot be specified for personal scope
validation.team_id_required_for_team: team_id is required for team scope
validation.is_sensitive_boolean: isSensitive must be a boolean value
validation.settings_object_format: Settings must be in object format

scope.invalid_or_missing_team_id: Invalid scope or missing team ID
scope.resource_not_found_or_no_access: Resource not found or no access
scope.only_owner_can_modify: Only the owner can modify the resource
scope.only_owner_can_delete: Only the owner can delete the resource
scope.routes_in_use: Cannot be deleted - routes in use

settings.only_admin_can_reset: Only admin user can reset settings

deliveries.not_found_or_no_access: Delivery not found or no access
deliveries.cannot_retry_sent: Successfully sent delivery cannot be retried
